nodes.text: Sapaaga, also known as Sapaaga the Hutt, was a Hutt that was known to bet on the droid races on the Nar Shaddaa Promenade. During the Grand Acquisitions Race, Sapaaga acquired a black and orange sphere which was one of the items hidden by the Chevin Conglomerate. After his betting gonk droid Racer CGK-0 lost several races to cheaters, he offered to give the sphere away to anyone that would punish his opponents and let the droid win.
Sapaaga the Hutt made his first appearance in hologram form in Star Wars: The Old Republic, in the 2012 world event "The Grand Acquisitions Race."
